title: Tanzania
subtitle: Safari through the vast plains of the Serengeti
short_description: Tanzania tops any wildlife-lover's bucket list. It is, after all, home to the world's highest concentration of national parksâ€”14 of them in all! Spot big cats, exotic birds, wild pachyderms and more in front of the breathtaking backdrop of Southeast Africa.
accommodations: Luxury tented camps and safari lodges
